title: AI Sales Development Rep
subtitle: Your tireless SDR that qualifies leads and books meetings 24/7
description: Stop losing leads to slow response times. Our AI SDR engages prospects instantly, qualifies them against your ICP, and books meetings directly into your calendar—while your human reps focus on closing deals.

targetAudience.title: B2B SaaS Companies
targetAudience.description: Scale your sales pipeline without scaling headcount. Qualify inbound leads instantly and keep your AEs focused on closing, not prospecting.

targetAudience.title: Growth-Stage Startups
targetAudience.description: Punch above your weight class. An AI SDR gives you enterprise-level lead response without enterprise-level budgets.

targetAudience.title: Sales Leaders & VPs
targetAudience.description: Boost your team's productivity by 3x. Let AI handle qualification while your reps focus on high-value conversations.

targetAudience.title: Companies with Slow Lead Response
targetAudience.description: Responding to leads within 5 minutes increases conversions by 21x. Our AI responds in under 30 seconds.

benefits.title: Instant Lead Response
benefits.description: Engage every inbound lead within seconds, not hours. Studies show responding in under 5 minutes increases conversion by 21x.

benefits.title: Intelligent Qualification
benefits.description: AI-powered BANT qualification that scores leads based on your exact ICP criteria, ensuring your sales team only speaks with high-intent prospects.

benefits.title: Automated Meeting Booking
benefits.description: Seamlessly checks calendar availability, handles timezone conversions, and books meetings directly—no back-and-forth email chains.

benefits.title: Multi-Channel Outreach
benefits.description: Engages prospects across email, LinkedIn, and chat with personalized messaging that adapts based on engagement signals.

features.title: Natural Conversations
features.description: Human-like dialogue that builds rapport and handles objections intelligently.

features.title: ICP Matching
features.description: Custom scoring models trained on your best customers to identify high-value prospects.

features.title: Smart Scheduling
features.description: Integrates with your calendar to book meetings at optimal times for your team.

features.title: Performance Analytics
features.description: Track conversion rates, response times, and pipeline contribution in real-time.

features.title: CRM Sync
features.description: Automatically logs all activities and updates lead records in your CRM.

features.title: 24/7 Coverage
features.description: Never miss a lead regardless of timezone or time of day.

useCases.title: Inbound Lead Response
useCases.description: Instantly engage website visitors and form submissions with personalized qualification conversations.

useCases.title: Outbound Prospecting
useCases.description: Execute multi-touch sequences across channels with AI-personalized messaging at scale.

useCases.title: Event Follow-Up
useCases.description: Automatically follow up with trade show and webinar attendees to maximize event ROI.
